page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN POYNTON (1)
page.content: We visited 11 separate homes to interview their owners about their lives in Poynton. It is a quiet residential area of bungalows, semi- detached and detached houses. People were not in at some of the houses we went to, they were probably shopping or at work. The average age of the interviewees was 55years. One of the questions asked was: Do you use the local bus service? Most people said no. We think most had cars. We discovered that the average length of time spent living in this area was 17years. One old lady had lived there all her life. Most people had children but they were at local schools or away at college.Another question we asked was: How often do you go away on holiday?Most people said twice a year.
